scenario_text.value: Nope, I haven’t seen her anywhere.

I see. Nothing yet, huh? I get the feeling
Aoi isn’t all that far away.

It’s just a hunch though, right? You can’t
just say what you want at a time like this.

I’m not! I just thought she may be on the way
back. Like in the forest, maybe...

Yeah, I think so, too.
I’ll take a look around for her.
